attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This is aVery horrible app it explains that Trump is a very horrible President Trump makes fun of Black people Asian people in all kinds of rice people and this is not allowed and I can’t believe there is still racism in the US like wow

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: God I wish there was a 0 star option because that is what I would give this. My cat died because of this game and my depression came back so thanks trump 🙄

attributes.title: UGH
attributes.review: This app is so disgusting I hate it. I kept trying to download but it kept saying “failed to download” then my phone broke and the whole screen was orange.

attributes.title: Made me blind🧚🏽‍♂️✨🐬
attributes.review: It didn’t help me at all and made me go blind now I got glasses wow how nice already Blind and dead but yea it made my phone blind too and made it glitch it’s sooo hard to keep my phone on too bc it’s there

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I saw that Trump is trying to ban tiktok. Tiktok is gen zs source of entertainment. He finds politics as entertainment and we find tiktok as entertainment. We aren't taking away his politics so he shouldn't take away out tiktok.

attributes.title: I’m traumatized
attributes.review: This man is in fact he is not even a “man” but he is disrespectful and racist I need this app off the Apple store right now how can people freaking support this terrible human being

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Wow. What a terrible app. You would think with all the money that man is worth he could afford to create a better app. He probably used all his money to make his Star Wars military AHAHAHAH

attributes.title: I almost died 🤮👹
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and when i saw 🎃🥕🍊 the carrot man, I passed out. I was on a roof and fell off because the sight of this mans face made me sick. I do not recommend this app at all, it can cause death.

attributes.title: Glitching
attributes.review: This app took 4 hours to download and it kept making me restart. I thought I was going to like it. But I hated it. I guess I’ll get my trump news somewhere else

attributes.title: Very bad app
attributes.review: I opened up the app i was expecting to see our president but I was sitting there like this🤦🏽‍♀️ 👁👄👁 because I couldnt figure out if i was looking at a chetto or a burnt hot pocket ethier way i dont clam that thing as my president. 🌈👑✨
